Player History
Drafted in 18th round, 280th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Gary Zoll (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/2015, off Dennis Moore (MON)...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 7/6/2015.
Injured on 10/8/2015 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Traded from Houston to Montreal on 3/2/2017 (Going to MON: RF Homer McCown. Going to HOU: RF Donald Dicarlo)...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2017...
Released by Montreal on 5/6/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 4/26/2019 to a minor league deal...
Released by Houston on 5/26/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 5/11/2020 to a minor league deal...
